text:
FR8 Revolution Inc | Oakland, CA | ONSITE | Senior/Principal Full Stack Engineer and Senior UI/UX Engineer | Full-time

Hi, I'm Steffen Enni, CTO at FR8 Revolution Inc a Volkswagen backed Series A company. Weâ€™re providing the $700B truck freight industry with a new and powerful way to help fleets fill their trucks, shippers track loads in real-time and drivers gain some control over their lives and careers. We're hiring experienced front end / full-stack / back end engineers to help build our product vision.

Our front-end stack is React, MobX, Material-UI, Jest+Enzyme on top of an api layer using Swagger/Node.js in front of a set of micro services built with Dropwizard, Java, Docker, Mongo and SQL. (See more on http://stackshare.io/fr8-revolution/fr8-revolution)

For more information have a look at our job openings at http://www.fr8.guru/jobs. Interested? Fee
